column2:
md_2022 <- get_acs(geography = "place",
                variables = c(population = "B01003_001"),      
              state = "MD",
              survey = "acs1",
              year = 2022) %>% 
  mutate(year = 2022)
The 1-year ACS provides data for geographies with populations of 65,000 and greater.
